textBeforeTable: Supported values are: To do this you need to edit each source and add an entry in the Data tab. The entry must have a key of "Census" and a value which is a code that identifies the census. Before using the census addons you need to define which of your sources are census sources. Configuration 7 External Links and ressources 6 Future Enhancements 5 Known Issues 4 Data Storage 3 Census Report 2.2 Census Editor 2.1 Census Listing 2 Census Gramplet 1 Configuration Contents The report prints census events in a format similar to the original census entries. The gramplet allows users to create and edit census data in a single form. There are two census addons: a gramplet and a report. search navigation, Jump to: diff) Newer revision → ( diff) | Latest revision ( ← Older revision |
